      • checkRecipes

        public java.util.List<Medicine> checkRecipes(Order order)
                                      throws DaoException
        Checks the availability of all necessary prescriptions for drugs included in this order.
        Specified by:
        checkRecipes in interface OrderDAO
        Parameters:
        order - order which we check for all required recipes.
        Returns:
        a collection of drugs without the appropriate recipes in the order. If all recipes are present, returns an empty collection.
        Throws:
        DaoException
